catalog_info.title: Intermediate Classical Tibetan
catalog_info.notes: Not open to auditors; cannot be taken Pass/Fail.
catalog_info.description: An intermediate classical Tibetan course emphasizing reading and translation of various Tibetan texts covering different genres, such as religious history, biography of Tibetan masters and folk literature writings. Please check the course website for the most updated information.

person.display_name: Leonard W. J. van der Kuijp
